testcase.classname: 1-Registration - User should be able to register a new account
testcase.name: user registers with valid data
testcase.system-out: Given user clicks on register button........................................passed When user enters personal details...........................................passed And user enters company details.............................................passed And user enters password....................................................passed And user hits register......................................................passed Then user registers successfully to nop commerce............................passed

testcase.classname: 2-Login - user can login successfully with valid credentials
testcase.name: user logins with valid credentials
testcase.system-out: Given user clicks on login button...........................................passed When user enters valid "automationtest@gmail.com" and "doaa123".............passed And user hits login.........................................................passed Then user logins successfully and redirected to home page...................passed

testcase.classname: 3-Currency switch - user should be able to switch currency from US Dollar to Euro
testcase.name: guest user switches between currencies [$,€]
testcase.system-out: Given guest user clicks on currency menu....................................passed When guest user selects Euro currency.......................................passed Then currency should be changed to Euro.....................................passed

testcase.classname: 4-Search - guest user should be able to search for any product
testcase.name: guest user searches for a product keyword and view results successfully
testcase.system-out: Given guest user clicks on search tab.......................................passed When guest user enters search keyword "Book"................................passed And guest user hits enter to search.........................................passed Then search results are displayed for user with relevant data...............passed

testcase.classname: 4-Search - guest user should be able to search for any product
testcase.name: guest user searches with sku and view results successfully
testcase.system-out: Given guest user clicks on search tab.......................................passed When guest user enters search sku "PRIDE_PRJ"...............................passed And guest user hits enter to search.........................................passed Then search results are displayed for user with relevant data...............passed

testcase.classname: user should be able to hover categories and select sub category
testcase.name: user could hover categories and select sub category
testcase.system-out: Given user hovers over category.............................................passed When user selects sub category..............................................passed Then page redirects to sub category products list...........................passed
